comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Knox's was a cracker of a shop with an incredible selection of superb Waterford Crystal. You saw pieces in there the craftmanship of which would make you green with envy!!

comment._content: fantastic detail! fascinating history! thanks for this!

comment.author: 54968992@N03
comment._content:
Excellent shot!

comment.author: 31536722@N00
comment._content:
What a great photo! Isn't it a shame though that we don't have distinctive shops like this any more. It seems to be all plastic convenience stores with gaudy colours—we've even stopped using the word 'shop'!. So many of our shops are now occupied by faceless multinationals employing indifferent staff.

Rant over! Thanks for your efforts in letting us see these images. Keep the beautifuf photos coming.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/an_solas] Thanks for the compliment! And well done on the rant - better out than in...
